meanings.definition: To assume financial responsibility for something.
meanings.sent1: The generous donor underwrites the cost of the school's new library.
meanings.sent2: The bank underwrites the loan for the small business.
meanings.sent3: The superhero underwrites the repair of the city after defeating the villain.
meanings.sent4: Her unwavering support underwrites the success of the team.
meanings.sent5: The insurance policy underwrites the protection of your belongings.

meanings.definition: To support or guarantee something, especially financially.
meanings.sent1: The company underwrites the concert to ensure its success.
meanings.sent2: The government agency underwrites the research project for scientific advancement.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand underwrites the spell for a magical outcome.
meanings.sent4: His reputation underwrites the credibility of the entire organization.
meanings.sent5: The scholarship underwrites the student's education for a brighter future.
